Special Powers
RALLY (4): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Human Torch hits, you may remove his RALLY die to deal penetrating damage.

Comments
January 7, 2022
nelson2208
Human Torch makes great sculpts! I really under estimated how cool this figure is until I held him in hand. His naked defense might be an issue but he looks damn nice sitting on the map!
December 8, 2021
The Singularity
All those bare defense slots make me nervous. He's a sitting duck.
November 30, 2021
Goop
The Incandescence mandarin ring for 5 points gives you the same effect and there are so many better figures you can put it on. His 8 range really is the best thing going for him but he just feels so overcosted, especially if you aren't getting a rally die. If he gets hit once he's likely on naked defense for rest of game. Still though that top click is pretty nice with 18ESD. He's barely average.
